attributes.review:
Trump 2020🌼💫✨🧚‍♀️but on a tombstone 🥰✨🌟🌸

Honestly what’s the point of making a useless app? I mean y’all have better things to use your storage on, what silly human wants to waist effort supporting a dusty Cheeto that should be crushed cuz of how old and soggy it is becoming. Thanks for coming to my ted talk, tootles now.
attributes.title: Welp

attributes.review:
Got this to observe what ridiculousness it could possible hold.  

Please if you are interested in politics EDUCATE YOURSELF before you support a ignorant human being that is detrimental to mankind. 

I can’t even understand all the disrespectful, racist, sexist, misogynistic crap that is associated with this app and the creators of it.
attributes.title: Oh. No.

attributes.review: This app is completely useless, if I wanted to learn about Trump’s big plans and stuff I would just watch the news.. Trump doesn’t even deserve an app. 🤦 You should’ve made a app about Obama not Trump, worse app I ever saw in my life. 🥱
attributes.title: Worse app ever

attributes.review: This app is so bad why would anyone download this I tried it for the 1 time cause I was with the boys and it completely terrible just don’t waste your time people
attributes.title: If you download this your a old lady dating your cousin

attributes.review: Great app, and highly recommend to anyone who’s a voter in the amazing country of the United States!!!
attributes.title: Great App!!!

attributes.review: Stop holding and advertising Trump Rally’s, and certainly stop holding them in states where COVID-19 is running like wild fire. He is being ignorant to the importance of this virus, and is single handedly being the reason that more Americans are losing their life to coronavirus. Vote him out.
attributes.title: Rallys

attributes.review: Trump is really racist first of all.. His app should not be on the App Store if he’s going to be treating people so badly and I tried downloading this app a month ago and it keeps glitching so therefore this app is so bad that it glitches so it should not be on the App Store. Periodt!
attributes.title: Racist!

attributes.review: As soon as I got this app everyone left me my boyfriend broke up with me my sister doesn’t want to speak to me. Heck even my stuff animals look at me weird and all the apps on my phone got deleted but the Donald Trump App
attributes.title: Be safe

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app it sent me a lot of random notifications(some were inappropriate!!!)  and then destroyed my Phone Please I don’t want you to have to go through what happens to me please DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: Please don’t download

attributes.review: This man said “if we don’t test we won’t have any corona cases” and when a report asked if he was kidding he said “ never kid” let’s leave it at that folks🔩 tighten the screws in your head people😌
attributes.title: Does not use common sense- mr. president has no brain
